1.title: The Ambush

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Celebrity couples arrive at boot camp to save their struggling relationships. A surprise press conference erupts in chaos after an affair is exposed.

2.title: Ring of Fire

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Drama ignites as stars are placed in an actual ring of fire and must battle over who is more to blame for their relationship problems.

3.title: The Morgue

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Stars come face to face with death after refusing to participate in a communication drill. JWoww dissolves into tears, Slade is pushed to his limits.

4.title: Secrets and Lies

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Stars divulge their darkest secrets. A traumatized Slade tells Gretchen to find somebody else. Roger erupts when JWoww fakes it through an exercise.

5.title: Daters and Traitors

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: The stars swap partners for the night. JWoww goes ballistic when a major secret is leaked to the press. Gretchen and Slade are forced to separate.

6.title: Sex and the Secret

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The stars divulge their sexual desires. Chaos erupts when JWoww's secret is leaked to the press. Roger destroys property in a fit of rage.

7.title: Fate Comes Knocking

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The stars confront the past while hidden agendas are exposed and overwhelming emotions send Tanisha to the emergency room.

8.title: Proposal or Disposal

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: A night on the town destroys one couple's last chance. A lie detector test exposes hidden truths. Two couples don't make it through the ring ceremony.

1.title: House of Lies

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Day one sees Spencer nearly come to blows with Director Jim Carroll after being called out for his behavior; Heidi storms off in hysterics; a surprise lie detector test sends shock waves through boot camp.

2.title: Death and Divorce Court

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Drama hits the roof in Divorce Court; Natalie clashes with the toughest judge in the country; Syleena walks out in tears. Couples are forced to stare death in the face; Spencer's antics infuriate the Directors.

3.title: Played and Betrayed

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Tyson reveals a secret about Rachel that shocks everyone; Natalie goes on a destructive rampage after Rachel betrays her in an exercise; Heidi joins the attack and Syleena explodes.

4.title: Picture Perfect Revenge

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Jealousy ignites when celebrity couples are forced to swap partners. Jacob is provoked and seeks revenge when he breaks a promise to his wife. Scandalous photos enrage Natalie as a shocked Heidi hides in fear.

5.title: Shock It to Me

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Couples are stunned when they undergo surprise shock therapy to learn how to communicate. A limb-throwing argument mortifies Aviva; Spencer insults Natalie and simmering tensions explode.

6.title: Lust or Bust

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: A sex tape exposes the reality stars; Aviva is humiliated. A game of spin the bottle reveals intimate confessions. Tyson proves to be selfish in and out of the bedroom; Rachel is over it and breaks down.

7.title: The Exorcism

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The stars reveal dark secrets from their pasts. An unexpected visitor blindsides Syleena. Heidi divulges a horrific betrayal. Spencer attacks Jim.

8.title: Let Them Eat Cake

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: A food fight spirals out of control when Aviva wrongly accuses Natalie of hitting her. Everyone turns against the housewife. An ultimatum puts Tyson and Rachel's relationship on the path of destruction.

9.title: Deception Indicated

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: A single's night out erupts into a drunken debacle between Heidi and Aviva. Reid tries to buy sexual favors for Tyson. A surprise lie detector test exposes the ugly truth when Syleena confesses to infidelity.

10.title: The Ultimatum

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: The final ring ceremony reveals the deal breaker results and forces final decisions. One couple faces an ultimatum. Will Tyson propose to Rachel or will he lose her forever?

1.title: Shotgun Wedding

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: The couples are ambushed by a shotgun wedding on the first day of boot camp. Stars are blindsided by unexpected guests who object to their relationships. Kendra explodes when she is confronted by her mother.

2.title: Death Wish

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Aubrey and Travis fight over another woman. Deathbed confessions rock the reality stars; Tami relives the past and Kendra pleads with Hank for the whole truth about the scandal that devastated their marriage.

3.title: Sex, Lies and Audiotape

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: A shocking audiotape blows Kendra and Hank's world apart. Kendra threatens divorce while Tami faces a pregnancy scare. And is it game over for Boot Camp's tumultuous fight club, Aubrey and Travis?

4.title: Disorderly Courtship

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: The couples face off in Divorce Court. Aubrey fears Travis will flee boot camp after testifying that he is not the one for her. Tami pushes Hank for answers and nearly comes to blows with Kendra.

5.title: Troubled Waters

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: The couples navigate the treacherous waters of communication, leaving a wake of destruction as the perfect couple, Jeff and Jordan, go off the deep end. Fed up, Kendra demands Hank tell the truth.

6.title: Dangerous Liaisons

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: A spouse swap sparks drama: Tami confronts Hank, Travis blasts Kendra while Aubrey crosses the line. Kendra questions her strength when Hank finally decides it's time to talk about his alleged liaison.

7.title: The Confession

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Hank finally breaks his silence regarding his alleged infidelity with a transgender model in a gut-wrenching confession. Kendra is devastated by his revelations. Travis crumbles when hit with harsh criticism.

8.title: The Sex Tape

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: A boot camp sex tape exposes Mike's weaknesses, Travis's insecurities and Kendra's need for control. After a fight with Reggie, Tami threatens to leave boot camp and meet up with her ex beau for a revenge romp.

9.title: Grave Injustice

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: The couples reveal traumatic events from the past and must forgive those who hurt them. Mike nearly comes to blows; a shocking revelation from Tami stuns all; and a surprise ambush leaves Hank frozen in fear.

10.title: The Long Lie

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: The couples unleash years of pent up rage when they face their inner demons, resulting in a jaw-dropping injury. A crushing revelation pushes Tami and Reggie's relationship to the brink.

11.title: Web of Lies

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

11.plot: A surprise lie detector test sparks the biggest meltdown in Boot Camp history. Infidelity is revealed; Travis storms off while Aubrey goes ballistic.

12.title: Diamonds Aren't Forever

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

12.plot: The reality stars must make their final decisions. Results from the lie detector test spark doubt. One spouse gets blindsided at the ring ceremony.

1.title: An Affair to Remember

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: The couples are ambushed by a surprise game show on the first day of Boot Camp, revealing dark truths. A secret affair is exposed while a disturbing twist sends one couple off the deep end and another packing.

2.title: The Secret Weapon

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: A surprise wedding takes a dark turn when tragedy strikes. Divorce Court's Judge Lynn Toler joins forces with Jim and Elizabeth and unleashes her wrath on the couples. Benzino goes ballistic and packs his bags.

3.title: Dancing with the Devil

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: A spouse swap that entails a sexy tango competition spirals into a jealous rampage. Sundy goes commando while Catherine's jealousy from sharing Sean with other women on "The Bachelor" reignites.

4.title: The Low Blow

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: The couples nearly come to blows when they fight dirty in a verbal boxing match. Catherine & Ink drop devastating truth bombs. Sugar Bear is forced to come clean about his infidelities; Mama June is crushed.

5.title: Sugar Coated Lies

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Frustration builds in a blind communication drill; Mama June suffers a panic attack. Sugar Bear confesses to more infidelities. A ferocious war breaks out when a secret pregnancy is exposed.

6.title: Kiss and Tell

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The reality stars open up about their sex lives; Sean and Catherine bare it all. Sundy and Benzino's secret past is exposed; Cedric is infuriated. With a child on the way, Althea and Benzino must cooperate.

7.title: Mocked and Rocked

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The couples confront their traumatic pasts and must forgive those who hurt them. Sundy breaks her silence regarding a childhood secret; Cedric is devastated. Catherine and Sean start to crack; Benzino ambushed.

8.title: Lowe and Behold

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Sean and Catherine fight dirty behind closed doors; Jim and Elizabeth confront them about their secret. Tension ignites when the couples expose their inner demons. Ink threatens to hurt the directors.

9.title: Poly-Wrath

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: The couples are ambushed by a surprise lie detector test; infidelities exposed. Sugar Bear goes ballistic when bombarded for answers. Catherine unleashes her wild side when the couples are given a hall pass.

10.title: The Broken Heart

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Heartbreak strikes at the final ring ceremony. The couples must make the ultimate choice; to stay together or to call it quits. A devastating decision shocks the house. A surprise proposal bursts into flames.

1.title: Taradise Lost

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: The house is shocked when one star enters boot camp alone and is sent out on a mad hunt to find their mate. Couples are blindsided by a surprise talk show hosted by Montel Williams, revealing dark secrets.

2.title: Over My Dead Body

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: The couples go into shock when forced to face the death of their partner. Tara shuts down and rebels. An unexpected guest puts the couples on blast, revealing trouble in paradise for Cody and Michelle.

3.title: Loose Lips Kill Relationships

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Spouse swap sparks chaos. Michelle goes ballistic when Cody spills a huge secret from her past, forcing Jim & Elizabeth to step in. And a Boot Camp first, one couple's shocking breakup leads to divorce!

4.title: Memp-Hitz the Fan

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Emotions explode during fight exercise. Questions of infidelity spark drama. Memphitz shocks all when he unleashes rage on Toya; Brittish attacks Lorenzo. Tara & Dean begin to unravel and true colors come out.

5.title: Hit Me with Your Best Shock

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Shock therapy shakes the couples to their core in the most challenging test yet. An explosive confession about infidelity rocks one relationship. One star is forced to leave Boot Camp. Tara & Lisa face off.

6.title: Puppet Master

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The stars get candid; sex lives exposed. Tara flees during sex drill. Michelle and Cody struggle between love and lust. Memphitz leaves for court -- will he return to Boot Camp?

7.title: Trainwrecking

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: The couples unleash their demons and face their dark pasts. Michelle reveals a painful secret. Memphitz returns from court; shocking attack. Tara spirals out of control.

8.title: Panic in the Control Room

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: The couples confront their own worst enemy, themselves! Michelle breaks down when she faces her infidelity; Dean has a breakthrough. An explosive Tara meltdown sparks chaos in the control room.

9.title: Lying Up a Storm

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Lie detector test reveals shocking truths. Memphitz is blindsided; Cody's hit with a low blow. A hall pass leads to a wild night of temptations, headaches and heartache. Tara & Dean slip & spill a huge secret!

10.title: Unveil the Betrayal

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Dirty secrets exposed from a wild night out. One star makes a devastating decision; ring ceremony heartbreak. Shocking scandal revealed; one couple gets kicked out of Boot Camp!

1.title: Can I Get a Witness?

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Boot Camp is launched into chaos when a high profile celebrity gossip blogger airs out everyone's dirty laundry; dark secrets exposed. Drama erupts in Divorce Court; surprise guest witness shocks all!

2.title: The Deadly Storm

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: The stars come face to face with death. A fatal crime scene triggers painful, final goodbyes; Tanner shuts down, Amber panics and a stubborn Storm laughs it off. Merika hits Margeaux with an ultimatum.

3.title: Blood in the Water

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Drama erupts when the stars fight dirty. KeKe storms off in a tirade; Amber breaks down over Jim's belligerent drinking habits. Nikko battles to win Margeaux back, but Merika's jealousy takes over.

4.title: Stranger Danger

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: A social mixer sparks chaos when couples meet their ideal mate. Jealousy strikes when partners watch from afar; Storm goes ballistic and Keke goes in for the kill! Jim faces off against Dr. V.

5.title: Pedal to the Meddle

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Communication drill drama; One couple is caught cheating! Keke and Margeaux face off. Margeaux & Nikko spark old flames; Merika's jealousy causes a meltdown. Jim unleashes on Amber; shocking issues exposed.

6.title: I Want a Husband and a Wife!

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The couples talk sex, leading to shocking confessions. Merika storms off when Margeaux reveals her true desires involve her ex. Keke & Margeaux face off. Amber exposes a dark secret from her past.

7.title: The Weakest Link

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: Couples expose painful secrets when they're forced to face their dark pasts. Karen breaks down over her dad's role in uncle's shocking murder. Tanner storms off when pushed to open up. Merika hits rock bottom.

8.title: Black Heart Down

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: The stars unleash self-hate when they must forgive their worst enemy, themselves! Jade is pushed to the edge while Keke and Margeaux go head-to-head. Lies about a secret kiss lead to trouble...

9.title: Jersey House Lies

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Lie detector test puts the couples on blast; dark secrets exposed! Amber fears the polygraph; Jade's dirty little secret. A wild night on the town sparks a catfight between the Jersey housewife & the mob wife!

10.title: Make Merika Great Again

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: The ring ceremony unleashes chaos. One spouse gets cold feet while another storms out of the mansion. Keke's shocking pregnancy test results. Panic strikes when divorce papers are served!

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Reality TV's most troubled couples arrive at Boot Camp with hefty baggage including a Bachelorette & a mob wife! A surprise press conference sparks chaos when dirty laundry is exposed; one partner storms off!

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

-1.title: Family Edition: Mama Don't Play

episode of.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars (TV Series 2014– )

-1.plot: A Boot Camp Thanksgiving sparks family war when negative traits are scored in a brutal game of football. Farrah takes a tumble while Paula gets put in a big time-out! Debra's gone but her secret erupts.

imdb.plot outline: Marriage Boot Camp is turned upside down when reality TV's most notorious couples come knocking for help with their struggling relationship. Notorious troublemakers work out their partnership issues during extreme relationship therapy. Secrets, lies, fear and betrayal rule the house like never before, forcing Boot Camp Directors Jim & Elizabeth Carroll to pull out all the stops to save these relationships.
imdb.title: Marriage Boot Camp: Reality Stars
plot: A group of famous couples trying to fix their relationships.

Marriage Boot Camp is turned upside down when reality TV's most notorious couples come knocking for help with their struggling relationship. Notorious troublemakers work out their partnership issues during extreme relationship therapy. Secrets, lies, fear and betrayal rule the house like never before, forcing Boot Camp Directors Jim & Elizabeth Carroll to pull out all the stops to save these relationships.::Anonymous
